name: Battlefly Deffect
description:
Take part in this fast-paced top-down action game, and use weather control to destroy your opponent, who is plotting to do the same to you!

The story describes a battle between two mad scientists. 

Tony and Melon were enemies since kindergarten. Always competing, always one trying to be better than the other. After graduating college with all possible awards and medals, they continued competing in their scientific careers as well. They both had a final goal: be the first one who is able to control the weather! Then finally the world will know, who is smarter, who is better, who is the best scientist in the Universe. 

Unfortunately, the scientific breakthrough came in at the same time for both of the hard-trying scientists. Against all  the odds, both of them took control of the weather at the same time! How will the world now decide, who is the mastermind and who is just a copycat? 

Both of them realized, there is only one solution for this problem: a battle to death. One quick phone call and they both agreed to seal the deal in a gentlemen manner. Use their newly created weather control devices and fight do death in their hovercrafts!
